mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY commentId) AS rownum, writeTitle, writeContent, w_customerId, writeInitdate, distinguish, writeId, writeDeletedate, commentId FROM `write` where ${combo} like #{searchContent} ORDER BY commentId DESC, writeInitdate ASC) w
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `write` (writeId, w_customerId, commentId, distinguish, writeTitle, writeContent, writeInitdate) VALUES (#{writeId} + 1, #{customerId}, #{writeId} + 1, 0, #{writeTitle}, #{writeContent}, now())
